local_intent: Perceive or scan for the white plate, ensure gripper open, move above the white plate, perform fine alignment, compute a top grasp and confirm the grasp pose is available.
assumptions: Using result_key 'white_grasp' as in GLOBAL_BT to store computed grasp pose
Offset_z 0.03 follows LOCAL_ANNOTATION and is treated as acceptable approach height
Vision pipeline will make IsObjectVisible/ScanForTarget effective
coherence_with_global: Consistent with GLOBAL_BT and GLOBAL_DESCRIPTION: perceives white_plate (fallback scan), ensures gripper open, moves above, aligns, computes grasp pose and verifies availability before subsequent pick.
